item.title: Crack the Hash Level 2 - TryHackMe
item.description: The challenge involves decrypting different hash codes using various encryption cracking techniques. The writeup is likely to describe the methods used and the steps taken to successfully crack the hash.

item.title: Crack the Hash - TryHackMe
item.description: analyzing and cracking hashes using hashcat and different online tools such as crackstation

item.title: Kali Linux 2023.1 - The Ultimate Platform for Offensive and Defensive Security
item.description: A comprehensive overview of the latest version of Kali, covering its features, enhancements, and upgrades, to provide you with all the necessary knowledge about this version.
